import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const BlogCard = (props) => { return ( <> {props.list ? (
{props.date}

{props.title}

{props.para}

{props.button}
) : (
{props.date}

{props.title}

{props.para}

{props.button}
)} ) } export default BlogCard
